name: Zandronum 3.1
author: sgrinter@goliathus.org
description:
This Egg will download and install Zandronum 3.1 and the following freeware wads. 

freedm.wad
freedoom1.wad
freedoom2.wad

The vanilla setup is deathmatch mode. Feel free to change server settings to your liking using the provided variables or edit the server.cfg and ~/.config/zandronum/zandronum.ini. Reinstalling the server will not override your settings, you will need to delete the files manually to lose any data. Place more wads in ~/.config/zandronum/ to play different games.

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Sets the server's name in Doomseeker.

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: Servers Password, leave blank for no password.

variables.name: RCON Password
variables.description: Sets the RCON password for remote management

variables.name: Message of the Day
variables.description: Sets what message your server will show after connecting.
variables.default_value: Welcome to Zandronum in a Docker Container!
